defaultMessage: Please enter the name of the organization you would like to contact.

Please enter the email address of the person or department responsible for handling GDPR / CCPA / privacy / legal requests. You can usually find this information on the privacy policy or contact us page of the organizationâ€™s website.
This will be used by the organization to identify you in their systems.

Optionally provide any additional information which may help the organization to identify you in their information systems such as Username, Customer ID or Account Number. Please do not provide your password.
Choose regulation based on your place of residence, unless you have a specific reason to choose differently.
